webProjects.heading: Codigo Content Editor Web App
webProjects.description: I designed the User Interface for this browser-based digital signage creation tool. The challenge was making it usable for both professional and amateur designers.

webProjects.heading: Duck Duck Beet Farm & Kitchen
webProjects.description: I was asked to create an e-commerce website for this unique business that delivers farm fresh meals directly to your door. My favorite part of this project was creating the custom illustrations and icons.

webProjects.heading: Comic Creator Mobile App
webProjects.description: I designed this app for sequential artists as part of my final project for the 10-week Springboard UX Design Course. I received a score of “Exceeding Expectations” in all categories from an independant industry expert.

webProjects.heading: May Fine Woodworking
webProjects.description: This project started out as a website makeover but turned into a full rebranding with a new logo, photography and promotional print materials.

webProjects.heading: Paint It Sweet
webProjects.description: During this project for a mobile art studio, I designed and developed the website, illustrated custom icons to explain the business to new customers, and reworked her logo using improved typography.

webProjects.heading: First Light Gallery
webProjects.description: I was asked to create a new website for an art gallery dedicated to photography. In order to best showcase the imagery, I placed full-screen images at the top of pages and used a muted color palette throughout the site. I also got to animate the First Light logo.
